context_bundle.summary: Fluentd is an open-source data collector for unified logging layers with a plugin architecture for flexible data processing

onboarding.quick_start: helm install fluentd fluent/fluentd --namespace fluentd --set env[0].name=FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_HOST --set env[0].value=elasticsearch
common_patterns: Input plugins: '@type tail' with 'path /var/log/containers/*.log' for log collection
Filter plugins: '@type kubernetes_metadata' for enriching logs with Kubernetes metadata
Output plugins: '@type elasticsearch' with 'host elasticsearch' and 'index_name fluentd'
Buffer configuration: '<buffer @type file path /var/log/fluentd-buffers> with flush and chunk limits
Plugin management: 'fluent-gem install fluent-plugin-elasticsearch' for additional plugins
Monitoring: '@type monitor_agent' with 'bind 0.0.0.0' for health monitoring
known_errors: Elasticsearch connection failed: 'curl http://elasticsearch:9200/_cluster/health' and verify network connectivity
High memory usage: 'fluentctl monitor' and adjust buffer chunk_limit_size and flush_interval
Plugin not found: 'fluent-gem list' and install required plugins with correct versions
Permission denied: 'chown fluentd /var/log/containers' and fix file permissions for log access
Backpressure: 'fluentctl debug input_config' and increase worker thread count
